verses.text: I will sing \w of|strong="H4905"\w* the lovingkindness \w of|strong="H4905"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* forever: With my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness to all generations.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w*, \w Mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* built up \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w Thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* establish \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3045"\w* heavens.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H8064"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* chosen, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* sworn \w unto|strong="H2617"\w* David \w my|strong="H3588"\w* servant:

\w Thy|strong="H1732"\w* seed \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* establish forever, \w And|strong="H5650"\w* build up \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* throne \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* generations. \qs Selah\qs*

\w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* heavens \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w praise|strong="H5769"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* wonders, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w Thy|strong="H3559"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H3559"\w* also \w in|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* holy ones.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* skies can \w be|strong="H3068"\w* compared \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* among \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mighty \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* very terrible \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* council \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*, \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* feared above \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* round about \w him|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H6918"\w* hosts, \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w*, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* unto thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*? \w And|strong="H3372"\w* \w thy|strong="H3372"\w* faithfulness \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee.

\w Thou|strong="H3644"\w* rulest \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pride \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sea: \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* waves thereof arise, \w thou|strong="H3644"\w* stillest \w them|strong="H5439"\w*.

Thou hast broken Rahab \w in|strong="H4910"\w* pieces, as one \w that|strong="H3220"\w* is slain; Thou hast scattered thine enemies \w with|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H7623"\w* arm \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w thy|strong="H7623"\w* strength.

\w The|strong="H6340"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H2491"\w* \w thine|strong="H6340"\w*, \w the|strong="H6340"\w* earth \w also|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H2220"\w* \w thine|strong="H6340"\w*: \w The|strong="H6340"\w* world \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H6340"\w* fullness thereof, thou hast founded them.

\w The|strong="H3245"\w* north \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3245"\w* south, thou hast created \w them|strong="H3245"\w*: Tabor \w and|strong="H8064"\w* Hermon rejoice \w in|strong="H8064"\w* \w thy|strong="H8064"\w* name.

Thou hast \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mighty arm; Strong \w is|strong="H8034"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H6828"\w* high \w is|strong="H8034"\w* thy \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

Righteousness \w and|strong="H3027"\w* justice \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* foundation \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* throne: Lovingkindness \w and|strong="H3027"\w* truth go \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* face.

Blessed \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* people that know \w the|strong="H6440"\w* joyful sound: \w They|strong="H6440"\w* walk, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* light \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w In|strong="H1980"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* name \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day; \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* righteousness \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* exalted.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* art \w the|strong="H3605"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* strength; \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H7311"\w* favor \w our|strong="H3605"\w* horn \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* shield belongeth \w unto|strong="H5797"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w And|strong="H5797"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* king \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Holy \w One|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7161"\w* Israel.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* spakest \w in|strong="H3478"\w* vision \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w saints|strong="H6918"\w*, \w And|strong="H3478"\w* saidst, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H3478"\w* help upon \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* mighty; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* exalted \w one|strong="H6918"\w* chosen out \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* found David \w my|strong="H5921"\w* servant; \w With|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H2623"\w* oil \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* anointed \w him|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w With|strong="H4886"\w* whom \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w hand|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* established; Mine arm \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* strengthen \w him|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* enemy \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3559"\w* exact \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, Nor \w the|strong="H3027"\w* son \w of|strong="H3027"\w* wickedness afflict \w him|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* beat down \w his|strong="H3808"\w* adversaries \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w*, \w And|strong="H1121"\w* smite \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* hate \w him|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5062"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* faithfulness \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* lovingkindness \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* name \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* horn \w be|strong="H6440"\w* exalted.

\w I|strong="H7311"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w set|strong="H7311"\w* \w his|strong="H7311"\w* hand \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w on|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* sea, \w And|strong="H2617"\w* \w his|strong="H7311"\w* right hand \w on|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* rivers.

\w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* cry \w unto|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w Thou|strong="H3027"\w* art \w my|strong="H7760"\w* Father, \w My|strong="H7760"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* rock \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H6697"\w* \w also|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \add my\add* firstborn, \w The|strong="H7121"\w* highest \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* kings \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* earth.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* lovingkindness \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* keep \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* forevermore; \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* covenant \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* stand fast \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w His|strong="H8104"\w* seed \w also|strong="H2617"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* I make \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w endure|strong="H5769"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* throne \w as|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w* \w of|strong="H1285"\w* heaven.

\w If|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w children|strong="H2233"\w* forsake \w my|strong="H7760"\w* law, \w And|strong="H3117"\w* walk \w not|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w mine|strong="H7760"\w* ordinances;
\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* break \w my|strong="H5800"\w* statutes, \w And|strong="H1121"\w* keep \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* commandments;

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* visit \w their|strong="H3808"\w* transgression \w with|strong="H2708"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* rod, \w And|strong="H2708"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* iniquity \w with|strong="H2708"\w* stripes.

But \w my|strong="H6485"\w* lovingkindness \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* not utterly \w take|strong="H6485"\w* \w from|strong="H7626"\w* \w him|strong="H6485"\w*, Nor \w suffer|strong="H6485"\w* \w my|strong="H6485"\w* faithfulness \w to|strong="H5771"\w* fail.

\w My|strong="H3808"\w* covenant \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* break, \w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* alter \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w thing|strong="H2617"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w gone|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H2617"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* lips.

Once \w have|strong="H8193"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* sworn \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H2490"\w* holiness: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lie \w unto|strong="H8138"\w* David:
\w His|strong="H1732"\w* seed \w shall|strong="H1732"\w* endure forever, \w And|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* throne as \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sun before me.

\w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* established \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* moon, \w And|strong="H5769"\w* \add as\add* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* faithful witness \w in|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sky. \qs Selah\qs*
But thou hast cast off \w and|strong="H5769"\w* rejected, Thou hast \w been|strong="H5769"\w* wroth with \w thine|strong="H3559"\w* anointed.

Thou hast \w abhorred|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* covenant \w of|strong="H5674"\w* \w thy|strong="H5674"\w* servant: Thou hast profaned \w his|strong="H5674"\w* crown \add by casting it\add* \w to|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* ground.

\w Thou|strong="H2490"\w* hast \w broken|strong="H2490"\w* down all \w his|strong="H2490"\w* hedges; \w Thou|strong="H2490"\w* hast \w brought|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H2490"\w* strongholds \w to|strong="H2490"\w* ruin.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* pass \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* rob \w him|strong="H7760"\w*: \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reproach \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbors.

\w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast exalted \w the|strong="H3605"\w* right hand \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* adversaries; \w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* enemies \w to|strong="H1961"\w* rejoice.

Yea, thou turnest back \w the|strong="H3605"\w* edge \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sword, \w And|strong="H8055"\w* hast not \w made|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H8055"\w* stand \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* battle.

\w Thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* brightness \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w cease|strong="H7725"\w*, \w And|strong="H6965"\w* cast \w his|strong="H7725"\w* throne down \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* ground.
\w The|strong="H7673"\w* days \w of|strong="H3678"\w* \w his|strong="H4048"\w* youth hast thou shortened: Thou hast covered him with shame. \qs Selah\qs*

How \w long|strong="H3117"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*? wilt \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* hide thyself \w forever|strong="H3117"\w*? \add How long\add* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* wrath burn \w like|strong="H5921"\w* fire?

Oh remember \w how|strong="H4100"\w* short \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*: \w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* vanity hast \w thou|strong="H3644"\w* created \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men!

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* live \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* see death, \w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* deliver \w his|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* power \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sheol? \qs Selah\qs*

Lord, \w where|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* former lovingkindnesses, \w Which|strong="H4310"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* swarest \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w David|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* faithfulness?

Remember, \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2617"\w* \w of|strong="H2617"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* servants; How \w I|strong="H7650"\w* \w do|strong="H7650"\w* bear \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* bosom \add the reproach of\add* all \w the|strong="H1732"\w* mighty peoples,

Wherewith \w thine|strong="H5375"\w* enemies \w have|strong="H5971"\w* reproached, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, Wherewith \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* reproached \w the|strong="H3605"\w* footsteps \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w thine|strong="H5375"\w* anointed.
Blessed \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* forevermore. Amen, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Amen. BOOK IV
